app_description: In life we often encounter many moments that we do not understand especially travel studies menus of exotic restaurants imported goods in supermarkets foreign mails and foreign publications etc. At this time a simple and reliable translation app is essential so Super Translator must be the good helper you are looking for. Features: Supports many languages Real time voice translation Advanced OCR translation Language detection in text to text mode Copy and paste translations with one click Friendly user interface Request permission: 1.Microphone for voice input and output 2.Camera and photo Photo Gallery for OCR translation Currently supported languages: Afrikaans Albanian Arabic Armenian Azerbaijani Basque Belarusian Bengali Bosnian Bulgarian Catalan Cebuano Chichewa Chinese Croatian Czech Danish Dutch English Esperanto Estonian Filipino Finnish French Galician Georgian German Greek Gujarati Haitian Creole Hausa Hebrew Hindi Hmong Hungarian Icelandic Igbo Indonesian Irish Italian Japanese Javanese Kannada Kazakh Khmer Korean Lao Latin Latvian Lithuanian Macedonian Malagasy Malay Malayalam Maltese Maori Marathi Mongolian Myanmar Burmese Nepali Norwegian Persian Polish Portuguese Punjabi Romanian Russian Serbian Sesotho Sinhala Slovak Slovenian Somali Spanish Sundanese Swahili Swedish Tajik Tamil Telugu Thai Turkish Ukrainian Urdu Uzbek Vietnamese Welsh Yiddish Yoruba Zulu... Super Translator is your best choice for translating any type of text voice and photo. Download now and enjoy the powerful features that take you away from worrying about translations.
